posts.postText:
Offender name?: Thermal
Which Server?: Jailbreak
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:1:15574365
What the Offender did?: Kept on freekilling as soon as he got on and just began trolling, and then used a hack to change his name randomly
Admins on?: No
Proof?: SCREEN SHOTS!!
The following two are showing that Thermal was using a name changer hack:
 http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x366/thecappiman/2011-05-22_00007.jpg 
 http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x366/thecappiman/2011-05-22_00006.jpg 

The following two are showing thermal's kills:

as you can see I did warn him about his freekilling. I wanted him to stop because he was making the game horrible for the other players, and me. Hope that this helps. I also did a complete recording but I do not have the proper software to do so and nor do I have the knowledge to do so either.

Hope this helps!
